}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This particular card has a P/N of ''03-0237-600 B'' (B2 revision?). :The unit's S/N is ''HER177E7FE''.
All the model / product info and "(C)1999 3COM CORPORATION" :is silkscreened on the top of the card.
*The '''3Com''' Ethernet controller (''[[Broadcom]]'' BCM5904 ?) is marked with... :*the '''3Com''' logo :*'''920-BR05''' :*'''3Com 40-0579-005''' :*'''BROADCOM 5904'''
===See also=== :[https://compress.ru/article.aspx?id=11513&part=index11ext1 Fast Ethernet Network Adapters Test] *[[3Com 3C905C-TXM|3Com EtherLink XL 3C905C-TX-M]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM5904 *[[Allied Telesyn AT-2500TX v2]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8139B *[[CNet CN-Pro 200]] - [[Davicom]] DM9102A *[[Compex RE-100TX]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8139B *[[D-Link DFE-530TX+ rev C1 (??)|D-Link DFE-530TX+]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8139 (DL10038) *[[D-Link DFE-538TX]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8139 (DL10038) *[[Genius GF-100TXR III]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8139С *[[Genius GE-2500 III]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8029AS *[[IBM Ether Jet]] (PRO/100 Network Adapter) - [[Intel]] 82558B *[[Intel EtherExpress PRO/100+ Adapter (689661-004)|Intel EtherExpress PRO/100+ Adapter]] - [[Intel]] 82558B *[[Intel EtherExpress PRO/100+ Management Adapter]] - [[Intel]] 82559 *[[Intel PRO/100B Adapter]] - [[Intel]] 82555/82557 *[[Prime PX-100]] - [[Intel]] 21143-PD / Davicom DM9101F *[[Prime PX-100jr]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8139С *[[SMC SMC1211TX (141211-407)|SMC SMC1211TX/WL]] (EZ Card 10/100) - [[Realtek]] RTL8139С (EN5030B1) *[[SMC SMC9432TX|SMC SMC9432TX/MP]] (EtherPower II 10/100) - [[SMC]] 83C171 *''Butterfly'' - [[Realtek]] RTL8139C *''UTT'' - [[Realtek]] RTL8139B
